titles: Courage crowned with conquest; or, A brief relation, how that valiant knight and that heroick champion Sir Eglamore bravely fought with, and manfully slew a terrible huge great monstrous dragon. To a pleasant new tune.
publisher: Printed for I. Wright, J. Clarke, VV. Thackeray, and T. Passinger.
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half sheet contains "The second part, to the same Tune."
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow Library.
